contest-event.event-date:
May 22, 1977 D Grand Shield British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) 10 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival grand-shield Winners back to 1952 are as engraved on the current Grand Shield trophy. Except for 1981 to 1984 where the bands on the trophy appear to have come second, not first! Was a different trophy given to the winners? If you know the answer please let us know.

There are also results on the trophy from 1902 to 1938, but they are for the Crystal Palace Contest (see link at top of page). Land of the Mountain and the Flood Belle Vue (Cumberland Suite), Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK May 1, 2010, 4:55 p.m. Aug. 20, 2011, 4:49 p.m. 1 Radcliffe Brass Band David Loukes 2 Rochdale Band Norman Ashcroft 3 Hyundai Heart of England Roy Curran 4 Shirland Welfare Band Doug Carlin 12 Lancashire Constabulary Band William Hill Unknown Result Agnes Street Band Ernest Ruddock Unknown Result Barnsley Brass Raymond Elderton Unknown Result Barrow Shipyard Band Barry Thompson Unknown Result Bedworth Silver Prize Band Ray Stuttard Unknown Result Blidworth Welfare Band Keith Wilkinson Unknown Result Gainsborough Britannia Works Band John Golland Unknown Result Haworth Band John Moor Unknown Result Laganvale Band Hugh Megarrell Unknown Result Lockwood Band (Huddersfield) Peter Kitson Unknown Result Northop Band Graham Jones Unknown Result Slaithwaite Band Peter Wadsworth Unknown Result Thornsett Brian Taylor Unknown Result Warburtons Bakery Band Harry Bentham Unknown Result York Railway Institute S. A. Renton Unknown Result Yorkshire Traction Edward Griffiths
